frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining color variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file setting up the app container and loading the main entrypoint.

frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching daily message, motto, all messages, and category-filtered messages from the backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS file defining a calming OKLCH color palette and utility classes for light/dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entrypoint that mounts React, sets up QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/music/tracks.ts: Empty file previously used for music track configuration.
frontend/src/pages/MainPage.tsx: React page that displays a motto and daily message with animated transitions and styled UI elements. Uses custom hooks for data loading and shows skeletons while fetching.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, animations, typography, and container settings with custom plugins and theme variables.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking state, issues, and feature requests, mainly focused on removing background music functionality.
